title.narrative: Enhancing Belize’s capacity to adapt to Climate Change

description.narrative: Global Climate Change Alliance Belize: Enhancing Belize’s capacity to adapt to Climate Change

The proposed initiative targets directly climate change governance structures, positioning the Government of Belize to effectively plan for and manage the effects of climate change on Belize’s Development.
independent political entity
